name: Mud Golem
languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine.
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The mud golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The mud golem makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Mud Ball
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.
